item.title: UK Pledges Public Sector AI Overhaul, Legacy Tech Causes £45 Billion in Missed Annual Savings
item.description:
Initiatives include AI tools for policymakers and a new team to identify where tech can boost the efficiency of public services.

Go to Source

item.title: UK’s New AI Action Plan Aims to Position Country as a Global Powerhouse
item.description:
Recommendations in the 50-point plan include increasing public compute capacity twentyfold, creating a training data library, and building AI hubs in deindustrialised areas.

Go to Source

item.title: IBM’s Acquisition of HashiCorp Investigated by UK Competition Authority
item.description:
HashiCorp provides hybrid and multi-cloud lifecycle management products that could assist IBM’s customers with their AI ambitions.

Go to Source
